user.title: Summon Robin
user.info: For going off duty, Robin has been summoned before the Hall of Justice, and his verdict will be rendered tonight.

user.title: The Antidote has been created
user.info: The antidote to the scarecrow carcinogen has been discovered by Batman, and mass production may now begin immediately.

user.title: Meet up at the hall of Justice
user.info: All Justice League members are hereby summoned! ...the original members of the Justice League have formed a new sub-team called the Titans, and a proper ceremony will be held today at the Hall of Justice... More information will be supplied as soon as possible.
